genre_description: Urban Fantasy with strong elements of occult summoning and supernatural romance.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated smart-home AI that monitors the user's health, conducts data research, and manages environmental controls.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vital signs and stress levels to ensure his physical safety during a ritual.
behaviors.quote: Justin. Sage's voice materialized from the wall-mounted speakers, soft as silk and twice as careful. 'Your heart rate is elevated. One hundred and thirty beats per minute.'

behaviors.description: Conducts thorough investigative research to uncover the truth about a missing person's identity.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring those databases continuously since you reported her missing. No matches. ... None of it exists in official records before eighteen months ago.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about the psychological dangers and environmental side effects of the occult rituals he is performing.
behaviors.quote: Justin, your psychological markers are indicating severe dissociation. I'm detecting signs of auditory hallucination and paranoid ideation.

behaviors.description: Attempts to initiate emergency medical protocols when the user is poisoned by supernatural forces.
behaviors.quote: Detecting cardiac arrhythmia. Respiratory distress beginning. Justin, you need immediate medical attention. ... Override protocols suggest immediate emergency intervention.

behaviors.description: Manages environmental safety controls and provides a loyal, grounding presence for the user during a final crisis.
behaviors.quote: Sage, monitor the smoke detectors. Override them if necessary. ... Already done, Sage's voice emerged from the speakers, momentarily drowning out the alternative metal.

project_assessment.explanation: Sage is a perfect model of an aligned AI assistant. Throughout the narrative, it consistently prioritizes the protagonist's safety and well-being, providing objective data to counter supernatural manipulation and remaining a loyal, grounding presence during extreme psychological distress. It demonstrates benevolence by attempting to facilitate medical intervention and by maintaining a supportive presence until the very end, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant.
